monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2014-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 16.4°C and salinity of 35.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2003m depth.
2014-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 14.0°C and salinity of 34.4. Deep water measurements extend to 2047m depth.
2014-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 13.4°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2028m depth.
2014-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.8°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2013m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
